title: Alibaba Cloud To Close Data Center Operations In Australia, India
text: Forgot Username or Password Date (MENAFN- Investor Brand Network) China-basedAlibaba Group Holding Ltd. (NYSE: BABA) has announced that it ishalting its data center operations in Australia and India as it focuses on expanding into southeast Asia and Mexico. The e-commerce company's cloud computing unit is poised to build new facilities in South Korea, the Philippines, Thailand, Malaysia and Mexico over the next three years as part of companywide efforts to increase infrastructure spending in different markets. The move to shut down its data center operations in India and Australia is part of Alibaba Cloud's“infrastructure strategy update.” According to... author: financialcontent.com
title: Synergy Credit Union Partners with Kuusoft to Enhance Customer Experience | FinancialContent Business Page
text:
Synergy Credit Union Partners with Kuusoft to Elevate Member Experience with NexSigns Digital Signage Solutions.
Kuusoft , a leading provider of digital signage solutions, proudly announces a strategic partnership with Synergy Credit Union , a prominent retail credit union based in Saskatchewan, Canada. The collaboration aims to elevate the member experience through the deployment of Kuusoft's innovative digital signage product, NexSigns.
Synergy Credit Union is a customer-centric retail bank dedicated to serving the financial needs of its members. With a commitment to fostering strong community relationships, Synergy Credit Union delivers a wide range of financial products and services, emphasizing personalized solutions tailored to meet the unique needs of its diverse membership.
As a retail credit union, Synergy Credit Union operates in the financial services industry, serving the residents of Saskatchewan. The credit union has a strong presence in the region, with a network of branches strategically located to offer accessible financial services to its members.
The decision to partner with Kuusoft and implement NexSigns was led by Camanie Glynn, Marketing Technology Specialist. The digital signage solution will be utilized across all ten branches, including several video walls and a large LED panel at the main branch in Lloydminster, Saskatchewan.
The primary objective is to enhance customer engagement by showcasing rate information and marketing materials through dynamic digital displays. The deployment of NexSigns replaces Synergy Credit Union's previous digital signage provider, offering a more user-friendly solution.
Synergy Credit Union faced challenges with their previous digital signage vendor: slow response times and a lack of proactive support. Camanie Glynn highlighted the frustration of dealing with ongoing issues and the need for a simpler setup that allows the credit union to focus on serving its members.
"We envision having a consistent point of contact who truly understands our systems and has the tools to let us focus on what we do best, without constantly dealing with digital display issues," said Camanie Glynn.
Synergy Credit Union chose Kuusoft for its commitment to providing a comprehensive solution aligned with the credit union's vision. The NexSigns digital signage platform with video wall hardware, offers a user-friendly experience, allowing for efficient content management and reducing the need for hands-on troubleshooting.
With all ten locations now using NexSigns, Synergy Credit Union looks forward to a positive and collaborative partnership with Kuusoft. The implementation aligns with the credit union's goal of delivering a seamless customer experience while streamlining its digital signage operations.
About Kuusoft:
Kuusoft is a leading provider of digital signage solutions, offering innovative products and services designed to transform communication in various industries. With a focus on delivering dynamic and engaging content, Kuusoft empowers businesses to connect with their audiences effectively.
To learn more, please visit www.kuusoft.com or call 604-639-7055.
About Synergy Credit Union:
It has been serving communities since 1943. Dedicated to making life and community prosperous. For Synergy, it’s about connection and doing the right thing. Synergy builds relationships beyond banking.
 Kuusoft Corp.

text: The initiative by the IAC is part of an ongoing effort to engage with policymakers and automotive leaders to foster a supportive environment for Auto LPG, aligning it with India’s goals for sustainable development." /

author: financialcontent.com
title: FARAH NAZ New York Creates 4th Collection, Announces Upcoming Runway Show for Sustainable Fashion | FinancialContent Business Page
text:
NEW YORK, NY / ACCESSWIRE / February 15, 2024 / FARAH NAZ New York , the center of sustainable luxury fashion, and women's brand SHEIN have unveiled their exclusive Evolushein collection. Titled SHEIN X FARAH NAZ New York , the line showcases a blend of the distinct aesthetic that fashion designer Farah Naz is known for and SHEIN's commitment to sustainability. Additionally, FARAH NAZ New York has announced its plans for an upcoming fashion show, which will display the exquisite, eco-friendly designs that embody style and commitment to the Earth.
Since its debut on New York runways in 2019, FARAH NAZ New York has been redefining haute couture in a world impacted by climate change and environmental pollution. Its emphasis is on fabrics and materials that are organic, biodegradable, and recycled, and it has earned an industry-reputation for hand-beaded wedding dresses, evening gowns, and ready-to-wear apparel that are luxurious, unique, and sustainable. By utilizing recycled materials, Farah Naz New York aims to minimize carbon emissions and pollution associated with the traditional manufacturing process, taking a step towards a greener future.
FARAH NAZ New York forged its strategic collaboration with SHEIN with the goal of furthering sustainable practices throughout the fashion industry. As the brand's Creative Director, Farah Naz was chosen out of thousands of hopefuls to be one of the four designers for SHEIN'S highly anticipated Evolushein collection. It features innovative and sustainable pieces whose fabrics were made from recycled polyester sourced from plastic bottles and scrap fabrics. Farah Naz and her team transformed these eco-friendly materials into designs that highlight style and sustainability.
Farah Naz expressed her excitement for this collaboration , stating, "Partnering with Shein has been an incredible opportunity to align our brand values and create significant change in the fashion industry. The Evolushein Collection demonstrates that style and sustainability can go hand in hand, empowering individuals to make conscious fashion choices and contribute to a healthier planet."
With three collections of luxury fashion created, FARAH NAZ New York is now developing its plans to bring its eco-friendly, elegant designs to the catwalk with a new fashion show. The highlighted pieces will reflect the designer's deep commitment to environmental consciousnesses as well as apparel and gowns that embody style and respect for the planet.
"At FARAH NAZ New York, we are humbled by the positive reception to our ‘green' designs and grateful for the new opportunities to transform the fashion industry and fight global warming," says Farah Naz. "In the new year, we will continue to work hard to create sustainable luxury collections so that we honor the incomparable beauty of Earth and can contribute to its healing."
Farah Naz, Fashion Designer and Creative Director at FARAH NAZ New York
FARAH NAZ New York is a privately-owned global women's fashion brand based in New York City. Founded by Farah Naz, it embodies intricately detailed traditional and modern hand-embroidered designs infused with eastern and western styles, creating easy-to-wear fashions. To learn more about FARAH NAZ New York, please visit www.farahnaznewyork.com/ or contact:
Farah Naz, FARAH NAZ New York
1-800-363-4544
info@farahnaznewyork.com
